Putrid zombies are monsters summoned during the fight with Rasial, the First Necromancer. Two of them also attack the player with Hermod, the Spirit of War during Alpha vs Omega.

When summoned by Rasial, the First Necromancer during Alpha vs Omega, their life points are halved.
